602290.name: Jack Orlando - Soundtrack by Harold Faltermeyer
602290.description:
The Official Soundtrack of Jack Orlando - 14 unique tracks in 5.1 composed by Grammy Award Winner Harold Faltermeyer!

PLAYLIST

  • 1. Introduction (2:16)
  • 2. Jack Orlando Main Theme (3:20)
  • 3. In The City (3:13)
  • 4. Streets Of Crime (5:19)
  • 5. I Close My Eyes And Think Of You (3:40)
  • 6. Casino (3:45)
  • 7. The Night Time Is The Right Time (3:59)
  • 8. Mystique (2:47)
  • 9. Blues At the Harbor (2:48)
  • 10. Scalletti and The Bad Guys (2:13)
  • 11. The Attack (4:16)
  • 12. Epilog (3:48)
  • 13. Military Grounds (3:30)
  • 14. I Close My Eyes And Think Of You - Remix (3:43)
602290.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
